title: What are the best natural attars?
description: Answer: There are many different types of natural attars, each with its unique scent. Some of the most popular and well-known attars brands include Hasan Oud, which has a strong, musky scent; Rose, which has a sweet, floral scent; and Sandalwood, which has a woody, earthy scent.
